holidays.name: Thanksgiving Day
holidays.description: A national holiday celebrating harvest and gratitude, traditionally celebrated with family gatherings and festive meals.

holidays.name: Christmas Eve
holidays.description: The evening before Christmas Day, traditionally celebrated with family gatherings and holiday preparations.

holidays.name: Christmas Day
holidays.description: A Christian holiday celebrating the birth of Jesus Christ, widely celebrated around the world with gift-giving and festive celebrations.

holidays.name: New Year's Eve
holidays.description: The last day of the year, celebrated with countdown events, parties, and fireworks displays worldwide.
